Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Edward Lewis
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for about three years now and it's done wonders for me! The quality of the build, the ease of use, and the overall feel of the camera is amazing.Pros:-18Mp Amazing quality shots-High 6400 ISO-Access to all other Canon lenses-1080p Video-Strong quality buildCons:-A little bulkyI love the 60D and would recommend it to anyone who's even remotely interested!

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0-megapixel CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Imaging Processor; ISO 100-6400 (expandable to 12800)
Improved EOS HD Video mode with manual exposure control; Vari-angle 3.0-inch Clear View LCD monitor
5.3 fps continuous shooting; enhanced iFCL 63-zone, Dual-layer metering system
Compatibility with SD/SDHC/SDXC memory cards (not included); please note that the EOS 60 is not compatible with CF memory cards
NOTE: includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories packaged in the original kit box except for the lens
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 60D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 3.0-Inch LCD & 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Zoom Lens
